main event: Multiple sightings of an unidentified flying object were reported in Dayton, Ohio between September 12 and September 14, 1967.
interesting points: The first sighting involved an object changing color from blue-green and red to a bright white light and was compared in brightness to a burning sparkler., A witness observed a bright circular light with a triangular outline through a telescope., Another observer noted that the object appeared to move eastward without changing altitude., A total of at least two confirmed witnesses reported seeing bright lights at night that appeared stationary at times but moved slowly., Reports included various descriptions of the object as either solid or luminous, and witnesses were prompted to provide details in standard questionnaires.
sighted object: A bright light changing colors, initially described as possibly triangular but later as circular
witness description: Civilians who reported their observations to the U.S. Air Force; one was a 13-year-old female.
